title: IT Security and Information Assurance
excerpt: Explains the critical role of IT Security and the comprehensive practice of Information Assurance (IA) in protecting systems and managing risks, focusing on the protection scope (integrity, availability, authenticity, non-repudiation, and confidentiality).

full_content.heading: IT Security
full_content.text: IT Security is critical for protecting information and systems.

full_content.heading: Information Assurance (IA)
full_content.intro: The overall practice of assuring information and managing risks is called Information Assurance.
points: Focus: Managing risks related to the use, processing, storage, and transmission of information or data.
Protection Scope: It protects the integrity, availability, authenticity, non-repudiation, and confidentiality of user data.
